title: If it sounds too good to be true, then it probably is ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è #bitcoin #crypto #ytshorts #fyp„Ç∑
transcript: How did Celsius go from unbank yourself to bankruptcy and fraud charges? Inside the company, the financial strain was mounting. Celsius wasn't generating enough revenue to cover its massive yield promises. So, it started taking riskier bets, including unsecured loans and speculative DeFi positions. The examiner's report called its business ponzylike, saying Celsius had likely been insolvent since inception.
